attributes.additional_details: 'The people of Littlehampton support 100% the CEO of NHS England for the need to decentralise the service and return the provision of health care back into the community. We the undersigned call on the The Health Department to rebuild the community hospital at Littlehampton on it's original vacant site as promised by previous PCT's. This will help put local healthcare back in the place of most need and is inline with the CEO's future aspirations for a peoples NHS.'
